metadata.title: CVE-2024-35328 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: libyaml v0.2.5 is vulnerable to DDOS. Affected by this issue is thefunction yaml_parser_parse of the file /src/libyaml/src/parser.c.

criterions.comment: libyaml package in trusty is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2024-06-19').
